meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6059.

td.p: Maureen Abell, a family law and immigration lawyer from New York, New York
Dan Jensen, a restaurant manager from Reston, Virginia
Steve Gratz, a freelance artist from Washington, D.C. (whose 2-day cash winnings total $30,999)

tr.td: FRANCE, FRANCE REVOLUTION
"V" SHALL SEE
DO YOU KNOW THE WAY TO SAN JOSE?
SAY UNCLE
STATE QUARTERS
NICK NAMES
